title: Use uploaded image as VOXA app logo

requirements.summary: Replace the SVG sound-wave icon in the Hero section with the uploaded VOXA logo image (voxa-logo.dim_256x256.png), saved as a static asset and rendered at 64×64 px next to the 'VOXA' wordmark
acceptanceCriteria: The uploaded logo image is saved as frontend/public/assets/generated/voxa-logo.png
The Hero section displays the logo image instead of the previous SVG icon
The logo is visually aligned next to the 'VOXA' text heading
The logo renders correctly on both desktop and mobile viewports
The previous sound-wave SVG icon is removed from the Hero section

file_operations.description: Save the cropped and transparent VOXA logo image (white abstract V-shaped mark with purple shadow) at this path. This is the edited version of IMG_20260208_191015_825.webp with tight bounds, transparent background, and 256×256 px dimensions.

Replace the current SVG sound-wave icon with an element that references frontend/public/assets/generated/voxa-logo.dim_256x256.png. Set the image dimensions to 64×64 px (w-16 h-16 in Tailwind) and ensure it is visually aligned next to the 'VOXA' text heading. Remove the existing SVG code entirely. Maintain the animated particle canvas background and overall Hero section layout.

requirements.summary: Display the VOXA logo image (voxa-logo.dim_256x256.png) in the Navigation bar alongside the 'VOXA' brand name at 32×32 px, replacing any existing SVG icon
acceptanceCriteria: The navigation bar shows the voxa-logo.png image next to the 'VOXA' text
The logo is scaled appropriately for the navbar (approximately 32×32 px)
Any previous SVG brand icon in the navbar is removed
The navbar layout remains intact and responsive on mobile

file_operations.description: Add an element in the Navigation bar that references frontend/public/assets/generated/voxa-logo.dim_256x256.png, displayed at 32×32 px (w-8 h-8 in Tailwind) next to the 'VOXA' brand name. Remove any existing SVG brand icon currently used in the navbar. Ensure the logo and text are horizontally aligned and the navbar remains responsive on mobile viewports. Preserve the sticky navigation behavior, section links, and mobile dropdown functionality.
